publishers.name: Philippine Statistics Authority
publishers.description: Official statistical agency of the Philippines, providing socio-economic data

publishers.name: PAGASA
publishers.description: Philippine Atmospheric, Geophysical and Astronomical Services Administration

publishers.name: Department of Health
publishers.description: Department of Health Philippines - Public health data and statistics

publishers.name: PHIVOLCS
publishers.description: Philippine Institute of Volcanology and Seismology

publishers.name: Department of Education
publishers.description: Department of Education Philippines - Education statistics and data

publishers.name: DENR
publishers.description: Department of Environment and Natural Resources

categories.name: Weather and Climate
categories.description: Weather forecasts, climate data, and meteorological information

categories.name: Disaster Management
categories.description: Earthquake, volcanic activity, and natural disaster data

categories.name: Environment
categories.description: Environmental monitoring and natural resources data

datasets.name: 2020 Census of Population and Housing
datasets.description: Comprehensive demographic data from the 2020 Census including population counts, household characteristics, and migration patterns across all regions, provinces, and municipalities of the Philippines.

resources.name: Population by Region and Province
resources.description: Total population counts by region, province, city, and municipality

resources.name: Household Characteristics
resources.description: Household size, type, and composition data

datasets.name: Real-time Weather Monitoring Data
datasets.description: Current weather observations from PAGASA monitoring stations nationwide including temperature, rainfall, humidity, wind speed, and atmospheric pressure readings updated hourly.

resources.name: Current Weather Observations
resources.description: Latest weather data from all PAGASA stations

resources.name: 24-Hour Rainfall Data
resources.description: Rainfall measurements from the past 24 hours

datasets.name: Philippine Earthquake Bulletin
datasets.description: Real-time and historical earthquake data recorded by PHIVOLCS seismic monitoring network across the Philippines, including magnitude, depth, location coordinates, and intensity reports.

resources.name: Latest Earthquake Bulletin
resources.description: Real-time earthquake events from the past 7 days

resources.name: Historical Earthquake Database
resources.description: Comprehensive earthquake records from 2010 to present

datasets.name: COVID-19 Case Tracker Philippines
datasets.description: Daily COVID-19 case data including confirmed cases, recoveries, deaths, active cases, and vaccination statistics aggregated by region and province.

resources.name: Daily Case Summary
resources.description: Daily aggregated COVID-19 statistics

resources.name: Regional Case Data
resources.description: Cases by region and province

resources.name: Vaccination Data
resources.description: Daily vaccination statistics by region

datasets.name: Basic Education Statistics
datasets.description: Comprehensive education statistics including school enrollment, number of teachers, dropout rates, and completion rates across all education levels (elementary, junior high, senior high).

resources.name: Enrollment by Division
resources.description: Student enrollment data by division and grade level

resources.name: Teacher-to-Student Ratios
resources.description: Teaching staff and student ratios by region

datasets.name: Tropical Cyclone Database
datasets.description: Historical records of tropical cyclones (typhoons) that entered or affected the Philippine Area of Responsibility (PAR), including track data, wind speeds, rainfall, and impact assessments.

resources.name: 2024 Tropical Cyclone Tracks
resources.description: Track data for all tropical cyclones in 2024

resources.name: Historical Cyclone Database (1970-2023)
resources.description: Complete historical database of tropical cyclones

datasets.name: Forest Cover and Land Use Statistics
datasets.description: Data on forest cover, deforestation rates, reforestation efforts, and land use classification across Philippine regions based on satellite imagery and ground surveys.

resources.name: 2023 Forest Cover Assessment
resources.description: Forest cover area by region and forest type

resources.name: Land Classification Map
resources.description: Land use and classification GIS data

datasets.name: Labor Force Survey Results
datasets.description: Quarterly labor force statistics including employment rate, unemployment rate, underemployment rate, and labor force participation rate by region and sector.

resources.name: Q3 2024 Labor Force Survey
resources.description: Third quarter 2024 employment statistics

resources.name: Historical Employment Trends
resources.description: Employment trends from 2010 to 2024

datasets.name: Active Volcano Monitoring Data
datasets.description: Real-time monitoring data from active volcanoes in the Philippines including seismic activity, gas emissions, ground deformation, and alert level status from PHIVOLCS monitoring stations.

resources.name: Current Volcanic Activity Bulletin
resources.description: Latest volcanic activity status and alert levels

resources.name: Taal Volcano Monitoring Data
resources.description: Detailed monitoring data for Taal Volcano

resources.name: Mayon Volcano Monitoring Data
resources.description: Detailed monitoring data for Mayon Volcano

datasets.name: Consumer Price Index and Inflation
datasets.description: Monthly consumer price index (CPI) and inflation rate data by commodity group and region, used to measure changes in the cost of living and purchasing power.

resources.name: November 2024 CPI Report
resources.description: Latest consumer price index and inflation rates

resources.name: Historical CPI Data (2010-2024)
resources.description: Monthly CPI and inflation rate time series
